text: @DHSCgovuk @CMO_England @CMOWales @CathCalderwood1 @PHE_uk @publichealthni @PublicHealthW @healthdpt @scotgovhealth The way we record the deaths is all wrong with this. Its harsh & blunt, but if you're dying anyway, say from a major trauma, & you contracted COVID19, you go on this list, even though the major contributing factor wasnt COVID19. What we need to know who died FROM it, not WITH it

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
